entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 1:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 8.2°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low 8.
